description:
Yun`yun is http://anidb.net/ch78018 [Megumin]`s former classmate and the crimson demon clan`s chief`s daughter. She`s a highly skilled archwizard whose lack of adherence to a crimson demon village custom causes her to be estranged from her peers. Yun`yun uses her lifelong rivalry with Megumin as an excuse to forge a friendship with her.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Yun`yun
